thread.title: High-activity sealed radioactive sources and orphan sources directive (The Environment Agency)
thread.title_full: High-activity sealed radioactive sources and orphan sources directive (The Environment Agency) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: High-activity sealed radioactive sources and orphan sources directive (The Environment Agency)
text: ( Source : The Environment Agency ) Applications to hold, accumulate or dispose of high-activity sealed sources ( HASS ) are made by a prospective user to the relevant environmental regulator under section 12 of the Environmental Permitting
